vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀμήν,
Hebrew adverb verily, of a truth, so be it, [LXX]; at beginning of sentence, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: amen, the truth; a formula of solemn expression of certainty. In the Gospel of John it is doubled in the sayings of Jesus for emphasis
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
amen, the truth; a formula of solemn expression of certainty. In the Gospel of John it is doubled in the sayings of Jesus for emphasis
in truth, most certainly; so be it;, ὁ ἀμήν, the faithful and true one, Rev. 3:14
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 堅決肯定所說的
1a) 阿們, 願它如此, 真地
2) 基督是最終的阿們
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 坚决肯定所说的
1a) 阿们, 愿它如此, 真地
2) 基督是最终的阿们
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: amên ; quả thật. Chuyển ngữ Hê-bơ-rơ sang Hy-lạp. Nguyên văn tiếng Hê-bơ-rơ (emeth : H543) nghĩa là « muốn thật hết ang » ; « Đúng như vậy ! » và chắc chắn, ổn định, có thể tin cậy
